value:
$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hey, look who it is! Yoo-hoo, over
here! We're over this way!$k$pNot that I like our odds fighting them
again... We've all lost to this group
once before.$k$p$WmMPID_ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I feel like my natural superiority is
being threatened. I do not like it.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Sure would be nice if Lady Luck
decided to smile on me again...$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We just have to do our jobs.$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|So everyone ready to go? I get such
a rush before a tough fight!$k$pWe know how strong these guys are,
so let's give it all we've got!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well, I guess you did it... You showed
us your strength. That fight was...
So... Much... Fun! Thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You have my thanks as well. Now I
can get back to my wife, Natalie.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Maybe Lady Luck did have a hand in
our meeting all along.$k$p$WmMPID_ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Normal,Face|$w0|No, I don't like this at all... You're
definitely a threat to my natural
superiority.$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yeah, being on the losing side does
take some of the fun out of it... But
just you wait till our next rematch!$k$pI'll beat you all next time. Even you!
Yeah, you under the hood over there!$k$pIt's $Nu, right?
You're the boss of this group? Hmm,
why do I feel like we've met before?$k$pWell, no matter. I hope you're looking
forward to our rematch, Boss,
because I'll be even stronger by then!$k$p$Sbs150|
